intro: Hildebrandtia diredawaensis, commonly known as the Ethiopian hildebrandtia, is a flowering plant native to Ethiopia. Its leaves are lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs, while its stems are erect and often branched. Hildebrandtia diredawaensis is of interest to botanists due to its unique adaptations and limited distribution.
